channel.title: Kubernetes pods on EasyCloudHost - Simple, Secure and Scalable cloud services
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes pods on EasyCloudHost - Simple, Secure and Scalable cloud services

item.title: What are Kubernetes pods?
item.description: A Kubernetes pod is a collection of one or more containers (such as Docker containers) that share network and storage resources and adhere to a set of operating rules.
